ygData.subject: Re: Watching Shada level . . .
ygData.msgSnippet: Haha I was too ashamed to admit it until you did.  I still tell my fellow EQ coworkers what level Shada is up too now with all of the characters.  =) Kurik
ygData.messageBody:
Haha I was too ashamed to admit it until you did. I still tell my fellow EQ
coworkers what level Shada is up too now with all of the characters. =)

Kurik Nitesong, 26th bard
Kayra, 15th monk
Veeshan

----- Original Message -----
From: Christopher Olcott <chrisamy@...>
To: <eqbards@onelist.com>
Sent: Thursday, October 07, 1999 10:58 PM
Subject: [eqbards] Watching Shada level . . .


> From: "Christopher Olcott" <chrisamy@...>
>
> Does anyone else here enjoy living vicariously through Shada and enjoy
seeing the:
>
> Shada D'ukal, Level 50 Wood Elf Bard
> Erisi Dlarit, Level 24 High Elf Paladin
> Tyria Sarkin, Level 22 High Elf Wizard
> Manda, Level 11 Wood Elf Warrior
>
> I started reading the list when Shada was in the 40's and it's been fun
watching Shada and other people's progress. I'm just hoping this weekend I
can get 26th and try the ever so often mentioned "fear/chain combo."
>
> Kassao, a few pixels shy of 25..
> Tarew Marr
>
>
>
> [Attachments have been removed from this message]
>
> > Please send submissions for the eqbards newsletter to toren@...
with the subject lol.
>
